__TOC__


A PPA has been setup which contains all of the Core Apps, and their dependencies (where not satisfied elsewhere). Core Apps are built and published regularly by Canonical infrastructure into this PPA. Add it to a computer running Ubuntu 14.04 or later, or a mobile device running Ubuntu Touch to install and test out the applications therein:-

* https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-touch-coreapps-drivers/+archive/daily

See also <nowiki>[[Touch-Collection-PPA|Collection PPA]]</nowiki>
